import "../../style/pages/home.css" import { useStore } from "react-redux" import { useState,useEffect } from "react" import DefaultHomePage from "../DefaultHomePage" import NameEditor from "../../component/NameEditor" function Home () { const user = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("user")) const sessionUser = JSON.parse(sessionStorage.getItem("user")) const store = useStore() const [userFirstname,setFirstname] = useState(store.getState().user.firstname) const [userLastname,setLastname] = useState(store.getState().user.lastname) const [logged,setLogged] = useState(store.getState().logged) useEffect(() => { store.subscribe(()=> { setFirstname(store.getState().user.firstName) setLastname(store.getState().user.lastName) setLogged(store.getState().logged) }) },[store]) if (logged === true) { let userData = [] user ? (userData = user) : (userData = sessionUser) store.dispatch({type:"setFirstname", payload: userData.firstName}) console.log(userData.firstName) store.dispatch({type:"setLastname", payload: userData.lastName}) console.log(userData.lastName) return (
